oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
We mean business
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two signs are pictured. One is illustrating Uncle Sam with the words, "We mean business; let's buy double this time." The other sign is a thermometer with quotas of a war loan drive.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Automobiles; Billboards; Jackson Square (Oak Ridge, Tenn.); Signs; Uncle Sam (Symbolic character); War bonds and funds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Roll 287-8; 7-11-1944; Billboard on Oak Ridge Area
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Oak Ridge Public Library, 1401 Oak Ridge Trpke, Oak Ridge, TN 37830 reference@oakridgetn.gov
